Title: Requires industrial development agencies to only include jobs filled by residents of New York state when assessing the progress of projects that are provided financial assistance
Summary: Requires industrial development agencies to only include jobs filled by residents of New York state when assessing the progress of projects that are provided financial assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง859-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring industrial development agencies to only include jobs filled by residents of New York state when assessing the progress of projects provided financial assistance
